Comment_contributor: ‘(side) hand’ **for this and all subsequent forms /neai/ and /eaba/ are used interchangeably**
**can concatenate ‘two’ and ‘one’ indefinitely for higher numbers**

Comment_glosser: ‘two eating fingers side leg fingers’ or ‘two eating fingers side leg’

Value: mita tamuma neai paroa aworma neai
Comment_contributor: 'two eating fingers side walking fingers’ **/sokei (neai)/ and /aworma neai/ are interchangeably used for referring to all the toes on a foot**

Value: mita tamuma neai paroa aworma neai orag
mita tamuma neai paroa aworma neai mita
mita tamuma neai paroa aworma neai mita orag
mita tamuma neai paroa aworma neai mita mita
mita tamuma neai mita aworma neai
